elements.name: When a valid GET request with appropriate authorization credentials and correct data (id)
elements.description:
is sent to the 'api/loans/details/{{id}}' endpoint, it should return a status code of 200, and the response
  remark should be "success"

steps.name: The API user sets "api/loans/details/31" path parameters

steps.name: The API user records the response from the api loans details endpoint with valid authorization information
The API user verifies that the status code is 200
The API user verifies that the remark information in the response body is "success"

name: As an administrator, I want to access the loan details information of a user with a specified ID via API connection.
